Package mediator

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SchedulingManagerModel
    An interface with methods that allow user to perform actions on model classes within GUI
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LoadFiles
    A class responsible for loading data from text files into the system
    LoadSchedule
    A class responsible for loading data about sessions from xml file
    SchedulingManager
    A class implementing methods from interface SchedulingManagerModel
    SessionHolder
    A class which only purpose is to keep data of one Session object between windows in GUI.
    StudentHolder
    A class which only purpose is to keep data of one Student object between windows in GUI.
    TeacherHolder
    A class which only purpose is to keep data of one Teacher object between windows in GUI.
    TimeSlotHolder
    A class which only purpose is to keep data of one TimeSlot object between windows in GUI.
    WriteToTextFile
    A class responsible for writing data from system into text files in order to preserve the data
    WriteToXML
    A class responsible for writing data of all sessions in the system into structured xml file in order to preserve data about sessions
